entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
